definitions.definition: A status of possessing a thing or an office; an incumbency .
A period of time during which something is possessed.
A status of having a permanent post with enhanced job security within an academic institution .
A right to hold land under the feudal system .

main_definition: A status of possessing a thing or an office; an incumbency .
secondary_definitions: A period of time during which something is possessed.
A status of having a permanent post with enhanced job security within an academic institution .
A right to hold land under the feudal system .
